greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of integers (with multiplicity) encountered on all possible paths from n to 1 when iterating with nondeterministic map k -> k- k/p, where p is any prime factor of k.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
formula: a(n) = n*A333123(n) + Sum_{p prime and dividing n} a(n - n/p).
program: A333000list(up_to) = { my(u=vector(up_to), v=vector(up_to)); u[1] = v[1] = 1; for(n=2,up_to, u[n] = vecsum(apply(p -> u[n-n/p], factor(n)[, 1]~)); v[n] = (u[n]*n)+vecsum(apply(p -> v[n-n/p], factor(n)[, 1]~))); (v); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 06 2020
